circularlinkedlist

Class SimpleLinkedList<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      • java.util.AbstractList<E>
        • circularlinkedlist.SimpleLinkedList<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - the data type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<E>, java.util.Collection<E>, java.util.List<E>

    public class SimpleLinkedList<E>
extends java.util.AbstractList<E>
implements java.util.List<E>, java.lang.Cloneable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<E>
    A circular, doubly-linked list class.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
